attributes.action: make St George's Day a National Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We get less national holidays than any other country in Europe. Some such as Italy get twice as many (16 compared to 8). So why not start to address the balance by making St George's Day a National Holiday?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
